actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported to Senate by Senator Johnston without amendment. With written report No. 102-120.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 182.
Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.
Received in the House.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Reported by the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs. H. Rept. 102-448.
Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 267.
Mr. Vento moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate.
On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Cleared for White House.
Message on House action received in Senate.
Measure Signed in Senate.
Presented to President.
Signed by President.
Became Public Law No: 102-258.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks and Forests
Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands

official_title: A bill to authorize and direct the Secretary of the Interior to terminate a reservation of use and occupancy at the Buffalo National River, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to terminate a certain reservation of use and occupancy retained by two named individuals at the Buffalo National River, Arkansas, and to refund the value of the unused term of such reservation, on a pro rata basis. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: A bill to authorize and direct the Secretary of the Interior to terminate a reservation of use and occupancy at the Buffalo National River, and for other purposes.
